name: Space Drifter (MZR Games)
description:
You are alone in space and the asteroids will crash against you, what is the solution?... DRIFT! Drift through space avoiding asteroids and try not to get dizzy. The game has a multiplayer mode and six different ships to have fun with your friends. The goal is to survive, defeat the boss, and unlock a super special ship, a satisfying experience  :) (Excuse me for the sound, it is that my computer is damaged and I have no way to repair it : 'c)
Support me c:
